title: Music thoughts
body: It would be a cool idea to make different kinds of music for the rift and not just a old one and a new one that are basically the same. xD

replies.body: What types of music would you like to have available?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Eno,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=aq8QA57f,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-11T16:55:19.467+0000)
>
> What types of music would you like to have available?

Music similar to this would be really cool in my opinion.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sTV0hJB3KBw
That would be amazing, hahahah! Imagine blasting through the jungle and ganking to this...

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Eno,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=aq8QA57f,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-11T16:55:19.467+0000)
>
> What types of music would you like to have available?

The entire Smite and Ignite album...

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Eno,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=aq8QA57f,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-11T16:55:19.467+0000)
>
> What types of music would you like to have available?

I own DJ Sona but don't play Sona.

So there's that.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Eno,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=aq8QA57f,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-11T16:55:19.467+0000)
>
> What types of music would you like to have available?

More metal - more Pentakill.
Like different beats like how Sona's ultimate skin does.

Though i get that it would likely be out of place on the rift, i really miss the 90's game music in general. While today we have orchestras (which are still amazing) and music that tends to blend in the background, i rather miss the instantaneous-ness and directness of say, FF7's fighting themes and their like. Get in a brawl? HERE'S YOUR MUSIC SIR, NOW PLEASE HOLD ON TO SOMETHING!
